channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: GTC felt more bullish than ever, but Nvidia’s challenges are piling up
item.description: Nvidia took San Jose by storm this year, with a record-breaking 25,000 attendees flocking to the San Jose Convention Center and surrounding downtown b...

item.title: 'We Don’t Want an AI Demo, We Want Answers’: Federal Workers Grill Trump Appointee During All-Hands
item.description: Leaked chats obtained by WIRED detail plans for the General Services Administration—and the staff's angry response.

item.title: The 33 Best Movies on Max (aka HBO Max) Right Now (March 2025)
item.description: Sing Sing, Heretic, and Beau is Afraid are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Max this month.

item.title: Apple faces lawsuit over Apple Intelligence delays
item.description: Apple has been sued in federal court over what plaintiffs allege is false advertising of several Apple Intelligence features. Filed Wednesday in U.S. ...

item.title: Apple is reportedly losing $1B per year on its streaming service
item.description: Apple is losing more than $1 billion per year on its streaming service, Apple TV+, according to a new report from The Information. Apple TV+ is the on...

item.title: Who's Elon Musk’s Biggest Fan? His Mom
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we tell you everything you need to know about Maye Musk.

item.title: Evidence Grows That Dark Energy Changes Over Time
item.description: The latest Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument results fall short of the discovery threshold but strengthen evidence for dynamical dark energy.

item.title: A high schooler built a website that lets you challenge AI models to a Minecraft build-off
item.description: As conventional AI benchmarking techniques prove inadequate, AI builders are turning to more creative ways to assess the capabilities of generative AI...

item.title: Federal judge blocks DOGE’s access to Social Security Administration’s banks of personal information
item.description: The order accused DOGE of engaging in a "fishing expedition" at the federal agency.

item.title: The Trump Administration Wants USAID on the Blockchain
